text: is a Japanese voice actress and singer from Nakamura-ku, Nagoya. She is affiliated with the IAM Agency. ==Early life== Matsui graduated from Aichi Prefectural Gamagori High School. She graduated from the voice actor talent department at Yoyogi Animation Academy. She then joined International Media Academy. Matsui started watching anime as a child under the influence of her father and older brother, and her mother told her that voice actor Ryōtarō Okiayu played the voice of Yuu Matsuura in the television anime Marmalade Boy. In 2017 she released her solo album debut Nijiyobi. ==Filmography== ===Anime=== *Gon (2012), Prairie Dog, Rabbit *Dusk Maiden of Amnesia (2012), Mina Suzuki *Maoyū Maō Yūsha (2013), Mazoku Musume *Log Horizon (2013), Isuzu, Kanako *Akame ga Kill!
